Extension  CamScanner for Chrome.


























































 The "CamScanner for Chrome" extension enhances your experience on the CamScanner website by allowing you to customize the quality of images and change the background color of the page.

Features:

Image Quality Adjustment: A user-friendly slider lets you easily change the brightness of images displayed on the CamScanner page, allowing for better visibility and clarity.
Background Color Customization: Choose your preferred background color to personalize your viewing experience and make it more comfortable for your eyes.
Easy to Use: The extension features a straightforward popup interface that enables quick adjustments with just a few clicks.
Whether you're using CamScanner for document scanning, image processing, or just for viewing, this extension provides the tools you need to optimize your workflow and improve your overall experience.

this is an unofficial CamScanner extension
